Test Description: Verify admin login with valid credentials
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with email and password
2. Verify response contains access token and refresh token
Expected Result: Status 200, Access token and refresh token returned, User data included

Test Description: Verify admin login with invalid credentials
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with incorrect password
2. Verify error response
Expected Result: Status 401, Error message indicating invalid credentials

Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with valid refresh token
2. Verify new access token is returned
Expected Result: Status 200, New access token returned

Test Description: Verify OTP sending for mobile login
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with mobile number
2. Verify OTP is sent via SMS
3. Verify OTP is stored in database
Expected Result: Status 200, Success message, OTP stored in database, SMS sent

Test Description: Verify OTP verification for mobile login
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with mobile number and OTP
2. Verify JWT tokens are returned
3. Verify user/technician attendance is marked (if applicable)
Expected Result: Status 200, Access token and refresh token returned, User data included, Attendance marked for engineers

Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with valid token
2. Verify refresh token cookie is cleared
Expected Result: Status 200, Success message, Refresh token cookie cleared

Test Steps:
1. Send request with different user roles (admin, staff, customer, technician)
2. Verify access granted/denied based on role
Expected Result: Admin: Access granted, Staff: Access granted, Customer: Access denied, Appropriate status codes

Test Description: Verify client creation with all required fields
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with client details (name, address, contact, etc.)
2. Verify client is created in database
3. Verify response contains client ID
Expected Result: Status 201, Client created successfully, Client ID returned

Test Description: Verify fetching all clients with pagination
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with pagination parameters (page, limit)
2. Verify clients list is returned
3. Verify pagination metadata is included
Expected Result: Status 200, List of clients returned, Pagination metadata (total, page, limit) included

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with valid client ID
2. Verify complete client details are returned
3. Verify related data (hospitals, RSO, institutes) is included
Expected Result: Status 200, Complete client object returned with all related entities

Test Steps:
1. Send PUT request with updated client data
2. Verify client is updated in database
3. Verify response contains updated client
Expected Result: Status 200, Client updated successfully, Updated client data returned

Test Steps:
1. Send DELETE request with client ID
2. Verify client is deleted/soft-deleted
3. Verify related data handling
Expected Result: Status 200, Client deleted successfully, Appropriate cleanup of related data

Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with hospital details
2. Verify hospital is created and linked to client
3. Verify response contains hospital ID
Expected Result: Status 201, Hospital created successfully, Hospital ID returned, Linked to client

Test Description: Verify fetching hospitals for a client
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with client ID
2. Verify list of hospitals is returned
3. Verify all hospitals belong to specified client
Expected Result: Status 200, List of hospitals returned, All hospitals linked to client

Test Steps:
1. Send PUT request with updated hospital data
2. Verify hospital is updated
3. Verify client relationship is maintained
Expected Result: Status 200, Hospital updated successfully, Client relationship intact

Test Description: Verify order creation with all details
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with order details (client, hospital, services, etc.)
2. Verify order is created
3. Verify order number is generated
4. Verify work order copy upload to S3 (if provided)
Expected Result: Status 201, Order created successfully, Order ID and number returned, File uploaded to S3

Test Description: Verify fetching all orders with filters
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with optional filters (status, date range, client)
2. Verify orders list is returned
3. Verify pagination works correctly
Expected Result: Status 200, Filtered orders list returned, Pagination working, Lead owner names populated

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with order ID
2. Verify complete order object is returned
3. Verify all related data (services, machines, client, hospital) is included
Expected Result: Status 200, Complete order details returned with all related entities

Test Steps:
1. Send PUT request with order, service, technician IDs and work type
2. Verify technician is assigned
3. Verify service status is updated
4. Verify notification/status change
Expected Result: Status 200, Technician assigned successfully, Service status updated, Work type set

Test Description: Verify office staff assignment to QA test
Test Steps:
1. Send PUT request with office staff details
2. Verify office staff is assigned
3. Verify service status is updated
Expected Result: Status 200, Office staff assigned successfully, Service status updated

Test Description: Verify mobile API for technician orders
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with technician ID
2. Verify list of assigned orders is returned
3. Verify order details include service information
Expected Result: Status 200, List of orders for technician returned, Service details included

Test Description: Verify order start functionality for technician
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request to start order
2. Verify order status is updated to 'In Progress' or similar
3. Verify timestamp is recorded
Expected Result: Status 200, Order started successfully, Status updated, Start time recorded

Test Description: Verify SRF details retrieval for technician
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with technician and order IDs
2. Verify SRF details are returned
3. Verify machine and service information included
Expected Result: Status 200, SRF details returned with machine and service information

Test Description: Verify machine details for service work
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with service details
2. Verify machine details are returned
3. Verify machine type and specifications included
Expected Result: Status 200, Machine details returned with specifications

Test Description: Verify service work update with file uploads
Test Steps:
1. Send PATCH request with work details
2. Upload files (uploadFile, viewFile) to S3
3. Verify service is updated
4. Verify files are stored in S3
Expected Result: Status 200, Service updated successfully, Files uploaded to S3, File URLs returned

Test Description: Verify service completion with report upload
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with completion status
2. Upload report file
3. Verify service status updated to completed
4. Verify report file uploaded to S3
Expected Result: Status 200, Service marked as completed, Report uploaded, Status updated

Test Description: Verify fetching additional services for order
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with order ID
2. Verify additional services list is returned
3. Verify service details and attachments included
Expected Result: Status 200, List of additional services returned with details

Test Description: Verify additional service update with file
Test Steps:
1. Send PUT request with updated service data
2. Upload new file if provided
3. Verify service is updated
4. Verify file upload to S3
Expected Result: Status 200, Additional service updated, File uploaded if provided

Test Description: Verify CT Scan service report header creation
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with service report header data
2. Verify report header is created
3. Verify report number is generated
Expected Result: Status 201, Report header created, Report number generated

Test Description: Verify CT Scan test data saving
Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with test data (various test types)
2. Verify test data is saved
3. Verify data validation works
Expected Result: Status 201, Test data saved successfully, Validation applied

Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with mammography report data
2. Verify report is created
3. Verify all test tables are accessible
Expected Result: Status 201, Mammography report created successfully

Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with report data
2. Verify report is created
3. Verify test tables are linked
Expected Result: Status 201, Report created successfully, Test tables linked

Test Description: Verify PDF generation for service report
Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with report ID
2. Verify PDF is generated
3. Verify PDF contains all test data
4. Verify QR code is included
Expected Result: Status 200, PDF generated successfully, All data included, QR code present

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with report ID
2. Verify complete report data is returned
3. Verify all test tables data included
Expected Result: Status 200, Complete report data returned with all test tables

Test Steps:
1. Send POST request with leave details (start date, end date, type, reason)
2. Verify leave application is created
3. Verify status is set to 'Pending'
Expected Result: Status 201, Leave application created, Status: Pending

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with optional filters (employee, status, date range)
2. Verify leaves list is returned
3. Verify pagination works
Expected Result: Status 200, Filtered leaves list returned, Pagination working

Test Steps:
1. Send PUT request to approve leave
2. Verify leave status updated to 'Approved'
3. Verify leave balance updated
4. Verify attendance records updated if applicable
Expected Result: Status 200, Leave approved, Status updated, Balance decremented

Test Steps:

2. Verify leave status updated to 'Rejected'
3. Verify leave balance not affected
Expected Result: Status 200, Leave rejected, Status updated, Balance unchanged

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with employee ID
2. Verify attendance summary is returned
3. Verify present/absent/leave counts
4. Verify date range filtering works
Expected Result: Status 200, Attendance summary returned with counts and statistics

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with employee ID
2. Verify current attendance status is returned
3. Verify today's attendance record included
Expected Result: Status 200, Attendance status returned, Current day record included

Test Steps:

3. Verify calculations are correct
Expected Result: Status 201, Salary created successfully, Calculations verified

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request with salary ID
2. Verify complete salary details returned
3. Verify all components (basic, allowances, deductions) included
Expected Result: Status 200, Complete salary details returned with all components

Test Steps:

2. Verify PDF is generated

Expected Result: Status 200, Payslip PDF generated, All components included, Proper formatting

Test Steps:

Test Steps:

Test Steps:

Test Steps:

Expected Result: Status 201, Invoice created, Invoice number generated, Calculations correct

Test Steps:

Test Steps:

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request for dashboard statistics
2. Verify key metrics returned (orders count, revenue, pending items, etc.)
3. Verify data is aggregated correctly
Expected Result: Status 200, Dashboard statistics returned with key metrics

Test Steps:
1. Send GET request for recent orders
2. Verify recent orders list returned
3. Verify limit and sorting work correctly
Expected Result: Status 200, Recent orders returned, Properly sorted and limited

Test Steps:
1. Upload file (image, PDF, document)
2. Verify file is uploaded to S3
3. Verify file URL is returned
4. Verify file is accessible via URL
Expected Result: File uploaded successfully, S3 URL returned, File accessible via URL

Test Steps:
1. Request data that includes S3 file URLs
2. Verify file URLs are correct
3. Verify files are accessible
4. Verify file download works
Expected Result: File URLs returned, Files accessible, Download successful

Test Description: Verify multiple files upload to S3
Test Steps:
1. Upload multiple files (uploadFile, viewFile[])
2. Verify all files uploaded to S3
3. Verify all file URLs returned
4. Verify files are organized correctly in S3
Expected Result: All files uploaded, All URLs returned, Files organized correctly

Test Description: Verify SMS service integration for OTP
Test Steps:
1. Send OTP request
2. Verify SMS is sent to mobile number
3. Verify OTP content is correct
4. Verify SMS delivery status
Expected Result: SMS sent successfully, OTP delivered, Correct format

Test Steps:
1. Monitor database connection
2. Test connection during high load
3. Verify connection pooling works
4. Verify reconnection on failure
Expected Result: Connection stable, Connection pooling working, Auto-reconnect on failure

Test Steps:
1. Create order with multiple services and files
2. Verify all data saved consistently
3. Verify rollback on error
4. Verify data integrity
Expected Result: All data saved consistently, Rollback on error, Data integrity maintained

Test Steps:
1. Request data with large dataset
2. Verify pagination works efficiently
3. Verify response time is acceptable (< 2 seconds)
4. Verify indexes are utilized
Expected Result: Pagination efficient, Response time < 2s, Indexes utilized

Test Description: Verify input validation on API endpoints
Test Steps:
1. Send request with invalid/missing required fields
2. Verify validation errors returned
3. Verify appropriate status code (400)
4. Verify error messages are clear
Expected Result: Status 400, Validation errors returned, Clear error messages

Test Steps:
1. Upload invalid file (wrong type, too large, corrupted)
2. Verify file validation errors returned
3. Verify file size limits enforced
4. Verify file type restrictions work
Expected Result: File validation errors returned, Size limits enforced, Type restrictions working

Test Description: Verify error handling for invalid requests
Test Steps:
1. Send request with invalid ID
2. Verify appropriate error response
3. Verify status code (404)
4. Verify error message is user-friendly
Expected Result: Status 404, Error message returned, User-friendly format

Test Steps:
1. Simulate server error (database connection failure, etc.)
2. Verify error is caught and handled
3. Verify appropriate status code (500)
4. Verify error logging works
Expected Result: Status 500, Error handled gracefully, Error logged, User-friendly message

Test Steps:
1. Send request with expired token
2. Verify 401 Unauthorized response
3. Verify error message indicates token expiry
4. Verify refresh token mechanism available
Expected Result: Status 401, Token expiry error, Refresh mechanism available

Test Steps:
1. Send request from unauthorized origin
2. Verify CORS error
3. Verify allowed origins are configured correctly
Expected Result: CORS error returned, Only allowed origins can access

Test Steps:
1. Send request with injection attempt (SQL, XSS)
2. Verify input is sanitized
3. Verify no code execution
4. Verify safe data handling
Expected Result: Input sanitized, No code execution, Safe data handling

Test Steps:
1. Send OTP request
2. Receive and verify OTP
3. Get access token
4. Use token for subsequent requests
Expected Result: OTP sent and verified, Token received, Subsequent requests successful

Test Steps:
1. Get assigned orders
2. Start order
3. Get SRF details
4. Update service work with files
5. Complete service with report
6. Verify all steps work together
Expected Result: Complete workflow functional, All steps integrated correctly, Data consistency maintained

Test Description: Verify trip and expense management workflow
Test Steps:
1. Create trip
2. Add expenses with receipts
3. View trips list
4. View expense details
5. Verify file uploads work
6. Verify data consistency
Expected Result: Trip created, Expenses added, Files uploaded, Data consistent
